remarks: This version of ~ rdgsucmpt avoids the not-free hypothesis of ~ rdgsucmptf by using two substitutions instead of one.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
rdgsucmpt2.1 $e |- F = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) $.
rdgsucmpt2.2 $e |- ( y = x -> E = C ) $.
rdgsucmpt2.3 $e |- ( y = ( F ` B ) -> E = D ) $.
rdgsucmpt2 $p |- ( ( B e. On /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d C y $.
$d D y $.
$d E x $.
